casebody.data:
DAVIS
v.
HULSING ENTERPRISES, LLC, et al. 160A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 10, 2016

Charles G. Monnett, III, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, For Davis, Thomas A.E. (Jr.), et al.

Isaac N. Northup, Jr., Attorney at Law, Asheville, For Hulsing Hotels North Carolina, Inc., et al.

Isaac Northup, Attorney at Law.

Lori P. Jones, Attorney at Law, R. Frank Gray, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For N.C. Restaurant and Lodging Association.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 10th of October 2016 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of October 2016."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 15th day of November 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
